explanation: [0-0] This is a split-screen video. The upper half shows cartoon characters with three white figures on the left and one red figure on the right. Their heads are cup-shaped, and the picture is in grayscale. In the lower half, a woman in a blue short-sleeved shirt stands on the right with her right arm outstretched, facing left. Her head is framed by a black "U" shape filled with green liquid. Three men in blue short-sleeved shirts face right, lined up in front of the woman. Their heads are also framed by black "U" shapes. They are standing on green grass with smoky mountains in the background.

[0-7] Continuing in the upper half, the red figure on the right pours red liquid into the head of the first white figure on the left. The first figure turns completely red, shakes, and grows larger. The red figure then takes out a white pen and writes "582" in white in front of the enlarged figure. The figure labeled "582" then walks to the right. In the lower half, the woman waves her hand, and the first man on the left walks up to her. The woman bends to the left and pours the green liquid from the "U" shape on her head into the "U" shape on the man's head. The man then grows larger. The woman waves her hand, and the man turns to the right. The woman sticks a QR code on the man's chest, and he walks to the right.
